message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Momentum skewed to exchanges, financials and select infra. Strong open=low breakouts in TATACOMM, CDSL, IRB, RBLBANK; profit-taking in metals (HINDCOPPER long upper wick, SAIL weak). IT/ER&D mixed with weakness in TATAELXSI; real estate resilient (PRESTIGE). Breadth slightly positive; watch for follow-through on Monday.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "TATACOMM", "signal": "Buy on pullback / momentum continuation", "reason": "Open=Low, wide range up, high volume; closing strong suggests follow-through. Prefer pullback entry with tight risk.", "price": 1855.0},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Bullish breakout", "reason": "Open=Low, strong close near day high with high volume; exchange/depository theme strong alongside BSE.", "price": 1608.0},
    {"symbol": "IRB", "signal": "Momentum buy", "reason": "Open=Low and strong close; continuation above recent intraday high favoured.", "price": 43.6},
    {"symbol": "RBLBANK", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Higher high/low day; close near H. Trigger above today’s high for continuation.", "price": 293.0},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Approaching swing high; strength in PSBs. Trigger on sustained move above today’s high.", "price": 94.8},
    {"symbol": "NAVINFLUOR", "signal": "Range expansion buy", "reason": "Strong range expansion and close near highs; consider only on strength over today’s high.", "price": 4750.0},
    {"symbol": "PRESTIGE", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Real estate strength; trigger above day high to confirm momentum.", "price": 1638.0},
    {"symbol": "SYNGENE", "signal": "Buy above trigger", "reason": "Reclaimed 650 zone; strength above micro-resistance improves odds.", "price": 654.0},
    {"symbol": "UNOMINDA", "signal": "Wait for reclaim", "reason": "Intraday sell-off to support; only consider long if it reclaims key level, else avoid.", "price": 1240.0},
    {"symbol": "TATAELXSI", "signal": "Avoid / breakdown risk", "reason": "Weak close near lows after failed bounce; risk of further downside below trigger.", "price": 5400.0},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Buy on dips", "reason": "Strong day with higher high/close; consider pullback entry near support.", "price": 2360.0},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Trim/Trail on weakness", "reason": "Long upper wick from 365 to 344 close indicates supply; protect gains if it slips under intraday support.", "price": 341.0}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Distribution candle with long upper wick and high volume; lock partial gains if price weakens. Execute only if it trades below 341.", "quantity": 10, "price": 341.0}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 13830.5,
    "total_value": 25752.25,
    "holdings_count": 2,
    "holdings": [
      "HINDCOPPER: 25 units @ ₹312.00 (CMP ₹344.55)",
      "BEL: 8 units @ ₹412.65 (CMP ₹413.50)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Exchanges/Depositories strong: BSE, CDSL leading; watch for follow-through.",
    "PSBs steady-to-strong: RBLBANK (private), IDBI, UCOBANK improving; look for breakouts above today’s highs.",
    "Metals mixed: HINDCOPPER shows supply; SAIL weak—avoid fresh longs until strength returns.",
    "Real estate resilient: PRESTIGE near breakout; OBEROIRLTY stable.",
    "Renewables mixed: KPIGREEN constructive; WAAREEENER and NTPCGREEN range-bound.",
    "IT/ER&D soft: TATAELXSI weak; KPITTECH flat; MPHASIS softer—prefer strength names only.",
    "Healthcare mixed: LAURUSLABS rebound attempt; SYNGENE strength over 654; diagnostics (LALPATHLAB) firm.",
    "Infra/Rail PSUs: IRB strong momentum; IRCON soft; RVNL range-bound.",
    "Appliances/Electricals: VOLTAS firm; HAVELLS steady; AMBER strong but high-priced.",
    "Consider Monday entries: CDSL above 1608, IRB above 43.6, IDBI above 94.8; size small with tight stops.",
    "Risk: Maintain 1.5–2.5% stop below entry for momentum plays; avoid chasing extended gaps."
  ]
